name: dust-overlay.png
description: A high-resolution image of colourful, fine dust particles and small scratches floating in the air, creating a subtle, vintage film grain effect, on a white background for cutout.

name: grid-background.jpg
description: A full, dark, futuristic digital background image featuring a glowing blue perspective grid receding into the deep navy blue or black cosmic void with subtle nebulous clouds.

name: rulebook.png
description: A photorealistic, colourful, thick, old-fashioned hardcover book, shot from a direct frontal angle, with a worn dark brown leather cover and ornate, faded gold trim, on a white background.

name: office-background.jpg
description: A full, slightly out-of-focus background image of a modern, corporate office at night, with glowing computer monitors and large windows showing an illuminated city skyline.

name: spreadsheet.png
description: A colourful, modern digital spreadsheet interface viewed from a slight perspective angle, filled with vibrant charts and graphs, with a clean, glossy look, on a white background.

name: vault-background.jpg
description: A full, wide-angle shot looking down the interior of a massive, secure bank vault, with walls lined with shiny, metallic safe deposit boxes and dramatic, dim lighting.

name: dollar-sign.png
description: A large, bold, 3D dollar sign ($) symbol made of polished, colourful, reflective gold, with bright highlights and deep shadows, viewed from a straight-on perspective, on a white background.

name: gray-cityscape.jpg
description: A full, panoramic photograph of a dense, sprawling metropolis under an overcast, gray sky, shot from a high vantage point, with naturally muted and desaturated colours.

name: light-crack.png
description: A vibrant, colourful, electric blue crack of light shattering a solid surface, viewed from the front, with jagged, energetic lines of light spiderwebbing from the center, on a white background.

name: circuitry-background.jpg
description: A full, highly detailed, macro photograph of a complex computer circuit board, with intricate, glowing cyan and blue data pathways against a dark, textured background.

name: gears-midground.png
description: A collection of medium-to-large sized, colourful, interlocking metallic gears made of brass, steel, and copper, arranged as a complex mechanism with realistic textures, on a white background.

name: gears-foreground.png
description: A composition of very large, detailed, colourful metallic gears that appear close to the camera, showing intricate teeth and surface imperfections to create a strong sense of depth, on a white background.

name: space-background.jpg
description: A full, breathtaking, high-resolution image of deep space, featuring a velvety black background filled with countless distant stars and colourful nebulae in shades of purple, blue, and pink.

name: earth.png
description: A stunning, colourful, photorealistic image of the planet Earth from space, showing detailed continents, swirling white clouds, and deep blue oceans, brightly lit from one side, on a white background.

name: machine-overlay.png
description: A complex, semi-transparent, colourful schematic overlay of mechanical elements, including glowing circuitry and intricate gears, arranged in a dense, radial pattern, on a white background.
